welcome_message_body: Welcome to Montero, Bolivia! Get ready to experience the charm of this bustling city known for its vibrant markets, delicious cuisine, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Montero has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: Chifa Nueva China
restaurants.description: Chifa Nueva China is a chinese restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Viru Viru International Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Viru Viru International Airport handles all cargo operations, including import and export.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
